Description: client's marital status:  ("married","divorced","single"; note: "divorced" means divorced or widowed)
client's average yearly balance, in euros
client last contact day of the month
client last contact month of year ("jan", "feb", "mar", ..., "nov", "dec")
client last contact duration, in seconds
client number of contacts performed during this campaign and for this client (includes last contact)
client number of days that passed by after the client was last contacted from a previous campaign (-1 means client was not previously contacted)
number of contacts performed before this campaign and for this client
outcome of the previous marketing campaign ("unknown","other","failure","success")
has the client subscribed a term deposit? ("yes","no")
